original: @112b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @112b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: k'a ru na sto tra /
analyzed: k'a ru na sto tra /
translated: Karunastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: snying rje la bstod pa /
analyzed: snying rje la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Compassion

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokite≈õvara.

original: padmas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba //
analyzed: padmas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba //
translated: Adorned with lotuses, born from Meru,

original: padma dri med phyag gi dbus na bsnams //
analyzed: padma dri med phyag gi dbus na bsnams //
translated: Holding in the center of his hand a stainless lotus,

original: thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs //
analyzed: thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs //
translated: Wearing a crown with a beautiful image of hair in braids,

original: spyi bo 'od dpag med brgyan phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: spyi bo 'od dpag med brgyan phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: His head adorned with AmitƒÅbha‚ÄîI pay homage.

original: thugs rje byams pas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: thugs rje byams pas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn who sees with compassionate love,

original: phongs gyur 'gro ba la ni khyod lta bu //
analyzed: phongs gyur 'gro ba la ni khyod lta bu //
translated: For you, like a protector, are for those in distress.

original: gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi bar mdzad pa po //
analyzed: gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi bar mdzad pa po //
translated: Merely by being seen, you bring peace,

original: spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigs su gsol //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigs su gsol //
translated: Avalokite≈õvara, look upon me.

original: mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal te //
analyzed: mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal te //
translated: The lord who grants boons is greatly suffering,

original: mun nag gtibs pa snang ba med pa bzhin //
analyzed: mun nag gtibs pa snang ba med pa bzhin //
translated: Like being enveloped in darkness without light.

original: ri bo g-yang sa'i khan gnas 'dra yi //
analyzed: ri bo g-yang sa'i khan gnas 'dra yi //
translated: Like dwelling in a mountain ravine,

original: dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigs su gsol //
analyzed: dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigs su gsol //
translated: At this time, O compassionate one, look upon me.

original: phongs pa gang gis da ni dran byas na //
analyzed: phongs pa gang gis da ni dran byas na //
translated: By whom I am now reminded of my distress,

original: de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes //
analyzed: de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúI will remove their suffering.‚Äù

original: dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de lags na //
analyzed: dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de lags na //
translated: If this first aspiration of yours remains unchanged,

original: bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //üîΩnga ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran yang rung //
analyzed: bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod // nga ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran yang rung //
translated: Then may I receive such a result.üîΩ‚ÄúMay I become a cure for all illnesses

original: nad rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces //
analyzed: nad rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces //
translated: For those who see, hear, touch, or think of me.‚Äù

original: bdag ni mi bzad nad kyis the bas lags kyis//
analyzed: bdag ni mi bzad nad kyis the bas lags kyis//
translated: I am afflicted by an unbearable illness.

original: mchog sbyin dam bcas de dag dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: mchog sbyin dam bcas de dag dgongs su gsol //
translated: O bestower of boons, please consider these promises.

original: gang zhig sdug bsngal gang gis nyam thag pa //
analyzed: gang zhig sdug bsngal gang gis nyam thag pa //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever suffering afflicts whomever,

original: de dang de yi sdug bsngal bsal lo zhes //
analyzed: de dang de yi sdug bsngal bsal lo zhes //
translated: I will remove that suffering of theirs.‚Äù

original: 'gro la dgongs pa khyod kyis rgyun 'byung na //
analyzed: 'gro la dgongs pa khyod kyis rgyun 'byung na //
translated: If this is your intention toward beings,

original: mgon po ci slad sdug bsngal bdag ma gzigs //
analyzed: mgon po ci slad sdug bsngal bdag ma gzigs //
translated: O protector, why do you not see my suffering?

original: gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang //
translated: ‚ÄúMerely by recollecting you,

original: @113a * // de yi mod la mgon pos gnod bsal na //
analyzed: @113a * // de yi mod la mgon pos gnod bsal na //
translated: O protector, harm is removed right then and there.

original: bdag ni rtag tu 'di na bro 'tshal kyang //
analyzed: bdag ni rtag tu 'di na bro 'tshal kyang //
translated: Though I am always sick right here,

original: thugs dpag ma mdzad pa ni bdag byur ngan //
analyzed: thugs dpag ma mdzad pa ni bdag byur ngan //
translated: You do not consider me, unfortunate that I am.

original: mthu ldan sgyu med phan mdzad blo gros can //
analyzed: mthu ldan sgyu med phan mdzad blo gros can //
translated: You are powerful, not deceptive, helpful, and intelligent.

original: thugs rje ldan pa khyod la bsten kyang ni //
analyzed: thugs rje ldan pa khyod la bsten kyang ni //
translated: Even though I rely on you, who are compassionate,

original: ci ste 'di dag zhi bar ma gyur na //
analyzed: ci ste 'di dag zhi bar ma gyur na //
translated: If these [sufferings] do not subside,

original: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te kyi hud kyis //
analyzed: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te kyi hud kyis //
translated: I will be miserable. Alas!

original: gang dang gang dag sdug bsngal nyam thag cing //
analyzed: gang dang gang dag sdug bsngal nyam thag cing //
translated: Wherever there are those who are miserable and distressed,

original: gang dang gang dag mgon med gyur rnams la //
analyzed: gang dang gang dag mgon med gyur rnams la //
translated: Wherever there are those who are helpless,

original: de dang der ni khyod kyi thugs rje ste //
analyzed: de dang der ni khyod kyi thugs rje ste //
translated: There your compassion

original: mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhes de skad gda' //
analyzed: mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhes de skad gda' //
translated: manifests and increases.

original: de ni las ngan nyon mongs bdag lags shing //
analyzed: de ni las ngan nyon mongs bdag lags shing //
translated: I am one with bad karma and afflictions,

original: sdug bsngal bzod dkas lus gzir skyabs ma mchis //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bzod dkas lus gzir skyabs ma mchis //
translated: Suffering unbearably, my body tormented, without refuge.

original: skyabs med bdag la ci slad thugs mi rje //
analyzed: skyabs med bdag la ci slad thugs mi rje //
translated: Why do you not have compassion for me, who is without refuge?

original: nyi tsher gyur na thugs rje ma lags mod //
analyzed: nyi tsher gyur na thugs rje ma lags mod //
translated: Is it not compassion if it is limited?

original: gang tshe sngon chad rmongs pa 'jig rten na //
analyzed: gang tshe sngon chad rmongs pa 'jig rten na //
translated: When in the past the world was ignorant

original: khyod nyid rjes su dran par ma bgyis pa //
analyzed: khyod nyid rjes su dran par ma bgyis pa //
translated: And did not remember you,

original: bdag ni nyon mongs stobs kyis shin tu gzir //
analyzed: bdag ni nyon mongs stobs kyis shin tu gzir //
translated: I was tormented by the power of afflictions.

original: mgon po 'gum du nye na thugs rjes gzigs /
analyzed: mgon po 'gum du nye na thugs rjes gzigs /
translated: O Protector, as I am about to die, look upon me with compassion!

original: thugs rje'i 'byung gnas thugs rje che rgyas pa //
analyzed: thugs rje'i 'byung gnas thugs rje che rgyas pa //
translated: You are the source of compassion, you are the one with great compassion,

original: sdug bsngal ma lus zad par mdzad khyod kyis //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ma lus zad par mdzad khyod kyis //
translated: You are the one who puts an end to all suffering.

original: ci ste bdag ni spangs par gyur na yang //
analyzed: ci ste bdag ni spangs par gyur na yang //
translated: Even if I were to abandon myself,

original: bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs //
analyzed: bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs //
translated: Who else would be my protector?

original: khyod la skyabs su mchis ba tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: khyod la skyabs su mchis ba tsam gyis kyang //
translated: Simply by taking refuge in you,

original: de yi mod la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas /
analyzed: de yi mod la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas /
translated: You immediately remove suffering.

original: mgon po khyod ni bdag gi skyabs lags kyis //
analyzed: mgon po khyod ni bdag gi skyabs lags kyis //
translated: Protector, you are my refuge,

original: thugs rjes mi bzad 'di las bskyab tu gsol //üîΩmtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag pa //
analyzed: thugs rjes mi bzad 'di las bskyab tu gsol // mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag pa //
translated: So please protect me with your compassion.üîΩSimply by reciting your name, you bring reliefüîΩTo those who are tormented.

original: zhi bar mdzad pa khyod dang mjal gyur la //
analyzed: zhi bar mdzad pa khyod dang mjal gyur la //
translated: I have met you,

original: bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na //
analyzed: bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na //
translated: But my efforts have borne no fruit.

original: khyod ni thugs rje can du rung lags sam //
analyzed: khyod ni thugs rje can du rung lags sam //
translated: Are you not compassionate?

original: khyod kyis sems can bskyab phyir smon lam gang //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can bskyab phyir smon lam gang //
translated: The aspirations you made to protect beings

original: btab par gyur de'ang 'grub par 'gyur lags na //
analyzed: btab par gyur de'ang 'grub par 'gyur lags na //
translated: Will be fulfilled.

original: bdag kyang sems can grangs su gtogs pas na //
analyzed: bdag kyang sems can grangs su gtogs pas na //
translated: I too am one of those beings.

original: mchog sbyin bdag gi du:kha bsal du gsol //üîΩkhyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchis kyang ni //
analyzed: mchog sbyin bdag gi du:kha bsal du gsol // khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchis kyang ni //
translated: Grant me the boon of removing this misfortune.üîΩ But if I have taken refuge in you,

original: ci ste de ni nyam thag gyur na ko //üîΩnyi ma mun pa'i tshegs su gyur pa bzhin //
analyzed: ci ste de ni nyam thag gyur na ko // nyi ma mun pa'i tshegs su gyur pa bzhin //
translated: and yet I am still in distress,üîΩit is as if the sun were covered by darkness,

original: zla ba'i 'od zer sreg par byed 'dra gang //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer sreg par byed 'dra gang //
translated: or as if the moon's rays were burning.

original: khyod ni 'jig rten dag la gsol 'debs na //
analyzed: khyod ni 'jig rten dag la gsol 'debs na //
translated: You are the one who is supplicated by the world,

original: bdag ni khyod la gsol ba bgyid gyur pa //üîΩbdag ni skye bo ngan pa skal pa chung //
analyzed: bdag ni khyod la gsol ba bgyid gyur pa // bdag ni skye bo ngan pa skal pa chung //
translated: and I am the one who supplicates you.üîΩI am of little merit, of bad fortune,

original: bsod nams min pa'i dri ma ngan pa can //
analyzed: bsod nams min pa'i dri ma ngan pa can //
translated: stained by the impurity of evil.

original: mgon po thugs rje che dang ma bral @113b bas //
analyzed: mgon po thugs rje che dang ma bral @113b bas //
translated: O Protector, do not abandon your great compassion,

original: sems can don la bskul lta mi 'tshal kyang //
analyzed: sems can don la bskul lta mi 'tshal kyang //
translated: though I am not worthy to be exhorted for the sake of sentient beings.

original: sdug bsngal rang bzhin du ni bdag gyur pas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rang bzhin du ni bdag gyur pas //
translated: Since I have become naturally inclined to suffering,

original: skyob pa'i spyan sngar yang ni gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: skyob pa'i spyan sngar yang ni gsol ba 'debs //
translated: I supplicate you, O Protector.

original: pha dang ma la gang zhig slong na yang //
analyzed: pha dang ma la gang zhig slong na yang //
translated: If someone were to beg from my father and mother,

original: shin tu skyo ba med pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: shin tu skyo ba med pa ji bzhin du //
translated: I would not be the least bit distressed.

original: sems can don brtson de ni khyod lags pas //
analyzed: sems can don brtson de ni khyod lags pas //
translated: Since you are the one who strives for the sake of sentient beings,

original: tshe rabs kun du bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig / sdug bsngal mi bzad pas ni bdag gdungs pas //
analyzed: tshe rabs kun du bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig / sdug bsngal mi bzad pas ni bdag gdungs pas //
translated: I am tormented by unbearable suffering.

original: bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'bod sgrogs kyis //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'bod sgrogs kyis //
translated: I cry out to the Blessed One,

original: nyin gcig bzhin du sdig pa'i las kyis ni //
analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin du sdig pa'i las kyis ni //
translated: Overwhelmed by evil deeds day after day,

original: zil non 'di las bdag la srung du gsol //
analyzed: zil non 'di las bdag la srung du gsol //
translated: Please protect me from this!

original: de ltar bdag gis shin tu smres gsol bas//
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis shin tu smres gsol bas//
translated: Thus I make this fervent request.

original: khyod kyi thugs ni thugs rjes brlan pa ltar //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs ni thugs rjes brlan pa ltar //
translated: Just as your mind is moistened with compassion,

original: 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya yis gzir ba la //
analyzed: 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya yis gzir ba la //
translated: Please look upon the world, tormented by hundreds of sufferings,

original: srid las grol bas de bzhin gzigs su gsol //
analyzed: srid las grol bas de bzhin gzigs su gsol //
translated: And liberate it from existence!

original: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur cing sems brtan la //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur cing sems brtan la //
translated: Overcome by compassion, with a firm mind,

original: gzhan don brtson zhing yon tan mchog gi gnas //üîΩkhyod bzhin bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gzhan don brtson zhing yon tan mchog gi gnas // khyod bzhin bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi //
translated: Striving for the welfare of others, the abode of supreme qualities,üîΩ May I too, like you, have the power

original: gdud bsal ba'i mthu dang ldan par shog / de ltar srid pa mthar phyin spyan ras gzigs dbang la //
analyzed: gdud bsal ba'i mthu dang ldan par shog / de ltar srid pa mthar phyin spyan ras gzigs dbang la //
translated: To dispel all the sufferings of the world!

original: bdag gis bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa //
analyzed: bdag gis bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa //
translated: Whatever merit I have gained by praising Avalokite≈õvara,

original: des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing bcom pa yi //
analyzed: des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing bcom pa yi //
translated: having abandoned and destroyed the suffering of beings.

original: rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du 'gro bar shog / snying rje la bstod pa dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du 'gro bar shog / snying rje la bstod pa dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of compassion composed by the lay vow holder Sarvasubhu is complete.
